message: This is my first time at sxsw and I didnt realize you needed to rsvp or buy tickets to the parties, is all hope lost for me or is this standard?
There are also a bunch of informal meetups which don't require an RSVP :)
@kickme444 you can find a bunch of parties on Plancast.com and it's not too late to RSVP
it's not too late. here's a master list of all parties, official and unofficial.
@kickme444 sift through and rsvp to anything that sounds at all interesting.

Search for SXSW on Eventbrite. Most of the parties are free and the RSVPs are still open. Also, just because you RSVP doesn't mean you will get in. The popular parties will have long lines of people who RSVP'd. Sign up for a lot of them just so you have options.
